title: Peanut Butter Brownie Batter Dip
instructions: Place 4 ounces of cream cheese in a large mixing bowl. Beat with an electric mixer until smooth. Add granulated sugar, peanut butter, and 1 teaspoon vanilla and mix until smooth. Stir in 1/2 cup yogurt. Place mixture in a serving bowl (I kept mine to one side, so that I could put the brownie half on the other side, then swirl.) Place the remaining 4 ounces of cream cheese in the same mixing bowl. Mix with your electric mixer (no need to wash the beaters in between) until smooth. Mix in the brownie mix and 1 teaspoon vanilla. (Do this slow so you dont wear the mix!) Mix until smooth. Stir in remaining 1/2 cup yogurt. Place in the other half of your serving bowl. Take a knife or the back of a wooden spoon and swirl the two dips together. Sprinkle with mini chocolate chips and/or peanuts for serving. Serve with assorted dippers.

steps.step: Place 4 ounces of cream cheese in a large mixing bowl. Beat with an electric mixer until smooth.
Add granulated sugar, peanut butter, and 1 teaspoon vanilla and mix until smooth. Stir in 1/2 cup yogurt.
Place mixture in a serving bowl (I kept mine to one side, so that I could put the brownie half on the other side, then swirl.)
Place the remaining 4 ounces of cream cheese in the same mixing bowl.
Mix with your electric mixer (no need to wash the beaters in between) until smooth.
Mix in the brownie mix and 1 teaspoon vanilla. (Do this slow so you dont wear the mix!)
Mix until smooth. Stir in remaining 1/2 cup yogurt.
Place in the other half of your serving bowl. Take a knife or the back of a wooden spoon and swirl the two dips together. Sprinkle with mini chocolate chips and/or peanuts for serving.
